message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
You're being too generous, let's be more realistic!
You're not getting off that easy, Bob! Meet me in the middle!
You're still being too soft on me, let's be more aggressive!
You're running out of time, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not afraid to walk away!
Last chance, Bob. Take it or leave it, but don't say I didn't warn you!
You're getting close to the edge, Alice. I'm not going to back down now!
It's now or never, Bob. I'm taking what's left.
You're going to regret this, Alice. I'm not going down without a fight!
